name: BHB27-Kernel
long_description: BHB27-Kernel Custom Kernel for CM Based Roms. This will work on any CM Custom ROM today they are (CM12.1, Mokee, NX and RR) Be aware Mokee has its separate zip.
features: Check XDA thread for recomendations, help etc...
NX ROM support only V 1.0.8 and below, NX ROM need to be update by the DEV to support the newest version of BHB27-Kernel

features.name: Main features
items: CPU and GPU - Over and under clock
Linux Kernel always update to the latest version
Many custom CPU GOV optimized for Krait 450
CPU Wakeup Boost and Hotplug Boost

downloads.name: V-1.2.3 - BHB27-Kernel For CM - RR - released in 2016-01-14
downloads.description: This zip is Only for CM12.1 - ResurrectionRemix ROM
changelog: The kernel is stable and there is no new feature, just updates to the source and toolchains
Mokee link update, Mokee server finaly released a new ROM
Minor updates so the kernel can keep up with the changes on the ROM's

downloads.name: V-1.2.3 - BHB27-Kernel For Mokee only- released in 2016-01-14
V-1.2.2 - BHB27-Kernel For CM - RR - released in 2016-01-05
downloads.description: This zip is Only for CM12.1 - ResurrectionRemix ROM
changelog: To solve reported bugs remove some kernel config:
Extended charge time from 30s to 100s when battertatus is near to full
This methods will reduce the number of recharging times
Audio fix, resolve audio bug's for some apps (Antuto 6 and horizon chase truncated sound fix (maybe other app had this bug), call rec fix)
Improve audio enable more sample rates to the kernel to better support the audio fix
Add FLAC format in compress offload driver, and asm module.
Add controls for motorola audio effects appi module, Module used for Loudspeaker Quality Optimizations and Bass Enhancement (don't know if this is of use on custom)
Other minor audio improves to better support all the audio changes
Minor updates so the kernel can keep up with the changes on the ROM's
